scripts.contract:build: : "${CONTRACT:?❌ CONTRACT is required (e.g. CONTRACT=mycontract)}" && rm -rf ./contracts/$CONTRACT/out && npm run contract:asc && npm run contract:types
scripts.contract:asc: : "${CONTRACT:?❌ CONTRACT is required (e.g. CONTRACT=mycontract)}" && deno x asc ./contracts/$CONTRACT/src/mod.ts -o ./contracts/$CONTRACT/out/mod.wasm --runtime stub --enable reference-types
scripts.contract:types: : "${CONTRACT:?❌ CONTRACT is required (e.g. CONTRACT=mycontract)}" && deno x tsc ./contracts/$CONTRACT/src/mod.ts --outFile ./contracts/$CONTRACT/out/mod.d.ts --noCheck --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly
scripts.contract:produce: : "${CONTRACT:?❌ CONTRACT is required (e.g. CONTRACT=mycontract)}" && deno run -A ./run/src/mods/produce/mod.ts ./contracts/$CONTRACT/out/mod.wasm
scripts.contracts:build: for dir in contracts/*/; do CONTRACT=$(basename "$dir") npm run contract:build || exit 1; done
scripts.contracts:produce: for dir in contracts/*/; do CONTRACT=$(basename "$dir") npm run contract:produce || exit 1; done
scripts.docs: npm run contracts:docs && npm run docs:catalog
scripts.contract:docs: : "${CONTRACT:?❌ CONTRACT is required (e.g. CONTRACT=mycontract)}" && deno run -A ./run/src/mods/docs/contract/mod.ts
scripts.contracts:docs: for dir in contracts/*/; do CONTRACT=$(basename "$dir") npm run contract:docs || exit 1; done
scripts.test:verbose: NODE_OPTIONS='--import tsx' cucumber-js --config cucumber.config.cjs --format progress-bar --format json:reports/cucumber-report.json
